english.segment1: So confined to the fear that you hold on to. Time unwinds and nothing seems. Promised you
english.segment2: Hey wait, i want to take you for a ride. Hey wait, i want to catch you. While there's time
english.segment3: Who'll(I'll) pick you up when there's no one. around?. Who'll(I'll) hold you up when your heart. Hits the ground?
english.segment4: So defined by a love that has fallen through. But hope is kind. When you hope in something. You know is true
english.segment5: You're tired and you can't take. Another time around. You know it's hope i'm holding. So i hope i've found you in this
